definition: standard conditions for temperature and pressure

sentences.english: Red edge position (REP, 680-780 nm) has been used for evaluating crop leaves nitrogen status.
sentences.chinese: 紅邊位置常被用於監測作物葉片氮素營養狀況。

sentences.english: This branch is obsoleted. Engineering resource will no longer be invested on this branch in general.
sentences.chinese: 此分支已淘汰，除特殊狀況人力不再投注於此版上。

sentences.english: To change this from the root, the government is duty-bound.
sentences.chinese: 從根本上改變這一狀況，政府責無旁貸。

sentences.english: The state of our inner-city schools is a case in point.
sentences.chinese: 我們內城區學校的狀況就是一個恰當的例子。

sentences.english: The referee didn't blow his whistle at all and Nani actually looked at him to check.
sentences.chinese: 裁判沒有吹哨，納尼看着裁判想確認狀況。

sentences.english: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.chinese: 毒品販子擔心傳統音樂會的狀況。

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the psychological state of criminal adolescences from the single child families.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討獨生子犯罪者心理狀況。

sentences.english: The distribution of mineral resources and the main production corporation of silver in the world are briefly introduced in this paper.

sentences.english: Motorcyclists and bicyclists are often the victims in such cases.
sentences.chinese: 機車與腳踏車騎士常常是這種狀況的犧牲者。

sentences.english: S-IV-37: How is the treatment situation for foreign ethnic groups in Germany?
sentences.chinese: 德國對外來種族羣體的治療狀況如何？

sentences.english: As a pastor I face this all the time.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個牧師我一直面對着這種狀況。

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: If deficits continue, self-governing body may put pressure on the financial situation.
sentences.chinese: 如果赤字繼續，可能對自治體的財政狀況產生壓力。

sentences.english: The morning session of the seminar was not well attended.
sentences.chinese: 這個研討會的晨會出席狀況不甚理想。

sentences.english: Chapter Three focuses on the development of the person painting after The Ming dynasty and The Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 第三章具體分析明清以後人物畫的發展趨勢和狀況。

sentences.english: But in Afro-Asian areas, the solution is not put enough attention.
sentences.chinese: 但是亞非落後地區的飲水狀況卻沒有得到人們的重視。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
relation/relationship/to concern/to affect/to have to do with/guanxi/CL:個|个[ge4]
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
